name: HomeBloodPressureMonitoringHBPM
title: Home Blood Pressure Monitoring (HBPM)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent home blood pressure monitoring.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) categories or attributes related to Procedure.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with blood pressure measurement by a patient at home.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)

concept.display: Blood pressure recorded by patient at home (procedure)

contains.display: Blood pressure recorded by patient at home (procedure)
